imgDesc.text: The Primal Obelisk was one of the hallmarks of the civilization that King Deshret built, but over time, the Sacred Seals upon the Obelisk have become lost to the four winds. Draw near and observe Obelisks to locate the direction in which the lost Seals have been scattered using the Obelisks' remnant power.
Find the lost Sacred Seals and return them near the Primal Obelisks. Perhaps this will allow the Obelisks to operate normally just as they once did, and you may discover now long-lost secrets...
